title: Design and Evaluation of University Writing Education Utilizing Computer-Assisted Investigative Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic writing structures and foundational knowledge of academic text analysis
context.additional_context: Utilizing tools to strengthen interdisciplinary connections within university foundational writing curricula, developing assignment design and evaluation systems through rhetorical pattern analysis of academic and non-academic texts.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze rhetorical patterns in texts using computer-assisted discourse analysis tools such as DocuScope.
Learners can identify structural features of academic writing and derive critical evaluation criteria based on analysis results.
Learners can refine their writing strategies by concretizing peer feedback using data provided by analysis tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
